hero.title: TUR Prices
hero.subtitle: Track and compare regulated gas prices (TUR) in Spain. Stay informed about the latest changes and make better energy decisions.

about.title: What is TUR?
about.description: TUR (Tarifa Última Recurso) is Spain's regulated gas tariff system designed to protect consumers. It offers stable, government-regulated prices that are reviewed quarterly.

rates.tur1: TUR1: For consumers with annual consumption up to 5,000 kWh
rates.tur2: TUR2: For consumers with annual consumption between 5,000 and 15,000 kWh
rates.tur3: TUR3: For consumers with annual consumption between 15,000 and 50,000 kWh (Deprecated)

q1.question: Who can apply for TUR rates?
q1.answer: Any consumer with annual gas consumption under 50,000 kWh can request TUR rates from authorized suppliers.

q2.question: How often do prices change?
q2.answer: TUR prices are reviewed and updated quarterly by the government.

q3.question: How do I switch to TUR?
q3.answer: Contact any of the authorized suppliers listed above. They are obligated to offer TUR rates to eligible consumers.
